extendedInfo.description: Looking for a convenient way to store growth measurements and calculated percentiles for each of your children, perhaps after well child visits to the doctor?"Percentiles" lets you enter each child's measurements and saves them in one place.  No need to remember the percentile or BMI values since the app calculates them for you.  The program can plot the measurements on the standard CDC growth charts and even share the charts with family and friends right from within "Percentiles." For your convenience, the app offers easy switching between metric and US customary units.Features:â¢ Record length, weight, and head circumference measurements of your childrenâ¢ Calculate percentile valuesâ¢ Plot measurements on standard CDC growth chartsâ¢ Share growth charts via email, messaging, Google+â¢, Picasaâ¢, etc.â¢ View BMI and BMI percentile for measurementsâ¢ Tool supports metric and US customary unitsPlease send feedback and feature ideas to:feedback@clin-an.com

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This app is perfect. Nice and simple and it works great.  My only feature request would be to add the weight to length charts.
reviews.author: A Google User
